title: How to Cancel an Amazon Gift Card Delivery

steps.title: Open Amazon in your internet browser.
steps.content: Open Amazon in your internet browser. Type www.amazon.com into the address bar, and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard.

steps.title: Hover over the Account & Lists button.
steps.content: Hover over the Account & Lists button. It's located below the search bar near the top-right corner of the page. It will open a drop-down menu. If you're not already signed in, click the Sign in button here to log in to your account.

steps.title: Click Your Orders on the drop-down menu.
steps.content: Click Your Orders on the drop-down menu. This will open a list of all your orders on a new page. Alternatively, you can click the Orders button next to Account & Lists . It will open the same page.

steps.title: Find your gift card delivery order.
steps.content: Find your gift card delivery order. You can check the Orders and Digital Orders tabs at the top. Here, you can also view your gift card's delivery date next to the order.

steps.title: Click Cancel items next to your gift card order.
steps.content: Click Cancel items next to your gift card order. It's on the right-hand side of the page. You will have to confirm cancellation on the next page.

steps.title: Select the items you want to cancel.
steps.content: Select the items you want to cancel. Click the checkbox next to every item you want to cancel in your order. You can also optionally select a reason for your cancellation on the drop-down menu at the bottom.

steps.title: Click the Cancel checked items button.
steps.content: Click the Cancel checked items button. This will confirm your decision, and cancel your gift card delivery.

steps.title: Open the Amazon app on your iPhone or Android.
steps.content: Open the Amazon app on your iPhone or Android. Find the Amazon icon in your apps, and tap the app icon to open it.

steps.title: Tap the ☰ icon.
steps.content: Tap the ☰ icon. This button is located in the upper-left corner of your screen. It will open your navigation menu on the left.

steps.title: Tap Your Orders on the menu.
steps.content: Tap Your Orders on the menu. This will open a list of all your recent orders on a new page.

steps.title: Find and tap your gift card delivery order.
steps.content: Find and tap your gift card delivery order. This will open the order details on a new page. You can scroll down to view all your orders, or use the Search all orders or Filter orders tools on the top-right.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Cancel order.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Cancel order . You can find it below the "View order details" button towards the bottom. If you don't see this option, tap View order details , and tap Cancel items at the top of this page.

steps.title: Select the items you want to cancel.
steps.content: Select the items you want to cancel . Click and check the box next to your gift card to cancel it. You can also select a cancellation reason on the drop-down at the bottom.

steps.title: Tap the orange Cancel checked items button.
steps.content: Tap the orange Cancel checked items button. This will confirm your decision, and cancel your gift card delivery.
